006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.flexmark;
007
008import com.vladsch.flexmark.ast.Emphasis;
009import com.vladsch.flexmark.ast.StrongEmphasis;
010import com.vladsch.flexmark.parser.core.delimiter.AsteriskDelimiterProcessor;
011import com.vladsch.flexmark.parser.core.delimiter.Delimiter;
012import com.vladsch.flexmark.parser.core.delimiter.EmphasisDelimiterProcessor;
013import com.vladsch.flexmark.parser.delimiter.DelimiterRun;
014import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.ast.DelimitedNode;
015import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.misc.Utils;
016import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.sequence.BasedSequence;
017
018/**
019 * Provides a temporary fix for the broken {@link EmphasisDelimiterProcessor} in
020 * Flexmark.
021 */
022public class FixedEmphasisDelimiterProcessor
023    extends AsteriskDelimiterProcessor {
024  // TODO: remove this class once vsch/flexmark-java#580 is merged
025  private final int multipleUse;
026
027  /**
028   * Construct a new delimiter processor.
029   *
030   * @param strongWrapsEmphasis
031   *          when {@code true} strong will wrap emphasis, otherwise emphasis will
032   *          wrap strong
033   */
034  public FixedEmphasisDelimiterProcessor(boolean strongWrapsEmphasis) {
035    super(strongWrapsEmphasis);
036    this.multipleUse = strongWrapsEmphasis ? 1 : 2;
037  }
038
039  @SuppressWarnings("PMD.OnlyOneReturn") // for readability
040  @Override
041  public int getDelimiterUse(DelimiterRun opener, DelimiterRun closer) {
042    // "multiple of 3" rule for internal delimiter runs
043    if ((opener.canClose() || closer.canOpen()) && (opener.length() + closer.length()) % 3 == 0) {
044      if (opener.length() % 3 == 0 && closer.length() % 3 == 0) {
045        return this.multipleUse; // if they are each a multiple of 3, then emphasis can be created
046      }
047      return 0;
048    }
049
050    // calculate actual number of delimiters used from this closer
051    if (opener.length() < 3 || closer.length() < 3) {
052      return Utils.min(closer.length(), opener.length());
053    }
054    // default to latest spec
055    return closer.length() % 2 == 0 ? 2 : multipleUse;
056  }
057
058  @Override
059  public void process(Delimiter opener, Delimiter closer, int delimitersUsed) {
060    DelimitedNode emphasis = delimitersUsed == 1
061        ? new Emphasis(opener.getTailChars(delimitersUsed), BasedSequence.NULL, closer.getLeadChars(delimitersUsed))
062        : new StrongEmphasis(opener.getTailChars(delimitersUsed), BasedSequence.NULL,
063            closer.getLeadChars(delimitersUsed));
064
065    opener.moveNodesBetweenDelimitersTo(emphasis, closer);
066  }
067
068}
